description: Lists the datasets for this domain.  The format should correspond to the spec at http://project-open-data.github.io/schema/
title: Project Open Data, /data.json file

description:
Geographic outlines (polygons) that represent a two-dimensional view of buildings in HRM. 
Click on link below for Metadata: https://www.halifaxopendata.ca/api/assets/7F873A08-C7DB-4CBB-866F-2C1C5EA13514
title: Building

description:
Points representing the geographic location of specific building use types (e.g. fire stations, police stations, schools, community centres, etc.). 
Click on link below for Metadata:
https://www.halifaxopendata.ca/api/assets/C0B80727-2E96-4FAA-B6F8-61D3A086BD5E
title: Building Symbols

description:
Points that represent crimes that have occurred in HRM within the last 7 days. Includes the type of crime, the date of the crime and the general location (the location of the point is not the true location of the crime, but a generalization to protect the victims).
Click on link below for Metadata:
https://www.halifaxopendata.ca/api/assets/6B3FE650-5978-4B35-913D-ADCB837DE812
title: Crime

description:
Single line representations of all bus routes in HRM. Includes route number, route name and route classification (e.g. peak, weekday regular, etc.). Click on link below for Metadata:
https://www.halifaxopendata.ca/api/assets/50FC1910-9EC3-4094-9BB6-BF5C0520A637
title: Bus Routes

description:
Points representing the geographic location of Metro Transit bus stops. Includes information on the type of bus stop (shelter, accessible, etc.) and GOTIME number. Click on link below for Metadata:
https://www.halifaxopendata.ca/api/assets/7C3AFD6F-164F-4583-8221-45596F9250DF
title: Bus Stops

description:
Geographic outlines (polygons) that represent the land use bylaw areas within HRM. To be used in conjunction with the zoning boundaries for correct interpretation of the zone code.
Click on link below for Metadata:
https://www.halifaxopendata.ca/api/assets/A7826A40-6A6A-4126-BBD7-9F1BE388BC34
title: Bylaw Areas

description:
Points representing the geographic location of civic addresses that includes civic number, street name and community information. 
Click on link below for Metadata:
https://www.halifaxopendata.ca/api/assets/B3863243-8E10-4456-AB9E-6796B75C2D1F
title: Civic Addresses

description:
Geographic outlines (polygons) that represent developed and undeveloped HRM park land. This data set includes parks at the neighbourhood, community, district and regional level.
Click on link below for Metadata:
https://www.halifaxopendata.ca/api/assets/13F5151D-28A8-4083-A0E9-1AE4B6E845A9
title: HRM Parks

description:
Points representing the geographic location of recreational features that are owned or maintained by HRM (e.g. playgrounds, sports fields, boat facilities, outdoor rinks, etc.).
Click the link below for Metadata:
https://www.halifaxopendata.ca/api/assets/06B565DF-1A4C-440E-BB48-FB9B62760434
title: HRM Park Recreation Features

description:
Geographic outlines (polygons) that represent the polling districts as approved by the Nova Scotia Utility And Review Board (UARB). Includes the current councillor and the school board district information. Click on link below for Metadata:
https://www.halifaxopendata.ca/api/assets/A01F3F0D-D493-4D61-A520-6EBE4670D9D3
title: Polling District

description:
Single line representations of trails that are either owned, maintained, or of interest to HRM. <<Work in Progress>>

Click on link below for Metadata:
https://www.halifaxopendata.ca/api/assets/96D35B7D-5CC9-4F0D-9B74-C6568C00F2EA
title: Trails

description:
Geographic outlines (polygons) that represent the solid waste (garbage and recycling) collection areas. Includes the current contractor, day of the week for collection and collection frequency.
Click on link below for Metadata:
https://www.halifaxopendata.ca/api/assets/32A94409-4B6F-4C36-97F5-BC6F4FDB38CC
title: Solid Waste Collection Areas

description:
Single line representation of every street in HRM with associated street name, block face ranges and community names. 
Click on link below for Metadata:
https://www.halifaxopendata.ca/api/assets/ACA19715-FA7E-4DD2-A9C0-3A8A7E98A20C
title: Street Network

description:
Geographic outlines (polygons) that represent the land use zone applied to a particular area of land within a land use bylaw (LUB) area. Zoning designations differ between LUB areas, so each zone must be interpreted within the context of the LUB area in which it is applied.
Click on link below for Metadata:
https://www.halifaxopendata.ca/api/assets/99F6A9E5-4AC3-42DA-BD4E-4C268CC212D9
title: Zoning Boundaries

description:
Geographic outlines (polygons) of all of the official community boundaries within HRM.
Click on link below for Metadata:
https://www.halifaxopendata.ca/api/assets/3C2BFA43-3FB4-4796-9042-93C2F77AF1D7
title: Community Boundaries

description:
Metro Transit bus scheduling information, released in Google Transit Feed Specification (GTFS) format.
Click on link below for Metadata:
https://www.halifaxopendata.ca/api/assets/E7940EC5-6310-4E4D-AACC-D32F0ABF650C
title: Transit Time Scheduling Data

description:
A digital elevation model (DEM) that shows the topography of the land. This DEM is what is called a bare earth model; in that the elevation model is representative of the land without taking into account the trees and buildings.
Click on link below for Metadata:
https://www.halifaxopendata.ca/api/assets/C479999A-2699-475D-B480-EEE73BEF044C
title: LIDAR DEM 5M
